summary: An FBI email from the New York Field Office regarding the Epstein case, forwarding a hotline tracker spreadsheet related to violent crimes against children and human trafficking investigations. The email indicates ongoing investigative activity and information collection.

events.title: Hotline Tracker Update
events.description: An Excel tracker file named 'HOTLINE_TRACKER_9PM_7.10.2019.xlsx' was attached to an FBI email, indicating information collection related to violent crimes against children and human trafficking.

keyFacts: The document is an FBI email dated July 11, 2019, from the New York Field Office.
The subject matter involves violent crimes against children and human trafficking investigations.
An attached Excel file named 'HOTLINE_TRACKER_9PM_7.10.2019.xlsx' suggests systematic tracking of hotline tips or information.
The document reference EFTA00147084 indicates it is part of the Epstein case file collection.
The email shows ongoing investigative coordination within the FBI's New York Field Office regarding these crimes.
